name: tomato fighters
description:
Local multiplayer 1v1 deckbuilder made for the Multiplayer Game Jam. Grow 10 tomatoes to win.

Player 1 - W A S D,   G, H 

Player 2 - Arrow Keys   .   /

Made by Michael @TooMuchTomato

with music by Jeff @JTN191

I streamed the full development of this game on twitch  https://www.twitch.tv/toomuchtomato

This is a prototype for a minigame that will be included in my full-length puzzle adventure game FORKLIFT FLOWERPOT! 

Wishlists on Steam help me a lot! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2073330/FORKLIFT_FLOWERPOT

HOW TO PLAY

Action Phase - Draw and play 5 cards. Cards can give your character resources or alter the terrain where your flowerpot is on the board . Switch between your hand and the board to carefully execute your plan.

Draft Phase - use your resources (banked rain tokens) to purchase new cards for your deck.

Scoring Phase - A random tile is chosen for scoring. If a player owns the tile, they gain 1 point along with the modifiers on that tile. For each round number, an additional tile is scored, ramping up the stakes. If able, the scoring tile will have +1 tomato token added to it after scoring.

RESOURCES

Wind - allows a player to move their flowerpot one space on the board.

Rain - claims an untaken space, adds to banked rain token when played on a space you already own.

Blight token- Adds a blight token to this space. Blight scores -1 for the player owner and will replace any tomato tokens on the tile.

Tomato token- Scores +1 tomato for the player owner. Can not replace a blight tile.

ADVANCED TECHNIQUES

Holding Tokens - Tokens can be held by pressing the action button in board mode. They do not score points when held (although I will probably change this in the post-jam version)

Blight Stacking - stack a bunch of blight together and drop it on your opponent for devastation

Tomato Stacking - steal and aquire tomatoes and stack them on your own tiles for potential quick wins.

Resource Hoarding - all resources persist between rounds. Go ahead, save your rain drops for a big purchase. Save your wind to drop a huge blight stack on your opponent.

KNOWN BUGS IN JAM VERSION

  • Score indication text is off sometimes
